TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
[redoing post]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-16T01:23:02Z" title="06/16/2015 01:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 16, 2015</time> by UnionPacific1983WP**
  
I HATE NINJAS

[**R**ed **E**ditors **D**idn't **O**rganize **I**nteresting **N**ew **G**roups, **P**ermanently **O**beying **S**ome **T**ractors.]

 R E D O I N G P O S T

DONGLE

Doing Osmosis Near Giant Leaning Embers.

FOUR

For our united republic.

FIVE

Freaking Immortal Vertical Endoskeletons

CENE

Cerulean Electric Nuns Egress.

JFHEY

Jeramey found her eating yogurt.

ZZZ

Zora Zeroed Zari

(Think school exam scores)

HELLO THERE

Hillary Edwards loves Leo Ostrich

They Have'n Engagement Ring'n Everything

KERBAL
Kerbals Endorse Real Body Astronaut's Lunch

?????

Ayylmao

Way to kill the thread, dude. I'll just continue with the previous entry:

Kerosene Exploding Resolves Ballistically Awkward Launches

RESTART

Edit: dammit: ninja'd!!!

Removed Entries Solemnly Tracked A Roaring Tractor

R----------E-------S---------T--------A-R--------T

Also, I didn't kill the thread. The dude that posted before me had no letters.

**AYYLMAO**

> 
> Also, I didn't kill the thread. The dude that posted before me had no letters.
> 
> **AYYLMAO**

I didn't mean you, I meant the dude who posted before you.

All Your Yearning Loses Meaning After Occultism

TAKETHAT

(It's meant to be random letters, not actual words)

vvudet

Very Varied United Duet Eating Tacos

nfgethvbndfh

no fun guessing everything that his verbose but nasty definition found humorous

spekdhap

So, Penta eats kerbals destroyed. How any person trusts him is odd.

gikdfjghsrgvaseh

Seems like you forgot this:

> 
> 1. **Only use 3-8 letters**

But who cares I'll do it anyway:

Good ink kills dead fish, joking, good hair saves red grease (vaseline) and secures everyone hairy.

phglasok

Pickled herrings give ladies and sisters oval kids. (What did I even just write)

gjggcbv

Good juice goes green coming back varied.

fvnfjaju

Frank, Vinnie, 'N Fanny [jerked around](http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/jerk%20around) Jerry Underwood.

BENJAMINFRANKLIN

*(Isn't it supposed to be 3-8 letters only? Bah...)*

Being enraged neatly jostled Andrew Marcus into naively flinging rocks at nasty killer lichens; it's nonsensical!

kroplort

Kerbals really obstruct proper laws or real times.

kgsdad

[Didn't know Mason, Thanks.]

Kelly gorily slipped, dripped, and died.

DUNBRUFJ
